flawed_nl_solution:
Before Samuel walked across the porch, there were 331 - 223 = <<331-223=108>>108 dust particles.
Those 108 were 1/10 of the original amount, so there were 108 * 10 = <<108*10=1008>>1008 dust particles on the porch before Samuel swept.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1080, not 1008. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
